result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Heber Benitez-Bernal

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Xavier Solis in court for Heber Benitez-Bernal. Defendant Heber Benitez-Bernal in court with Spanish interpreter Reme Bashi. Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Solis advises that this matter is not resolved and will probably need to be set for trial but will wait to see what happens in the co-defendants case.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 02:00 pm.

NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Xavier Solis in court for Heber Benitez-Bernal. Defendant Heber Benitez-Bernal in court. Clerk. M.Burke. State in victim rights compliance. Attorney Solis states he needs more time to discuss with the state and the DE.
Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

NO RECORD MADE.  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Solis and Spanish Interpreter Leo Martin.  Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Solis stated that they are working on a global offer. STC set to 09/21/22 at 10:30.

Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Johnson and Attorney Solis and Spanish Interpreter Leo Martin.  Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Seth Johnson is withdrawn from the case and Atty Solis is now the attorney on the case. STC set to 08/31/22 at 2:00.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
